title: Replace app logo with uploaded asset

requirements.text: Replace the existing static logo asset so that all current usages display the newly uploaded logo image.

quotes: add this logo in place of logo

acceptanceCriteria: A logo image file exists at frontend/public/assets/logo-job.jpg and is included in the production build.
Landing page hero logo displays the new logo (no broken image).
Landing page footer logo displays the new logo (no broken image).
Dashboard header and footer logos display the new logo (no broken image).
Admin header logo displays the new logo (no broken image).
No code changes are required to existing image src paths (they remain /assets/logo-job.jpg).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep existing references working without changing their src.
nonGoals: Creating additional logo variants (SVG, monochrome, favicon) unless explicitly requested.
Changing layout, copy, or brand colors beyond what is necessary to swap the logo asset.

edits: Use the uploaded logo as the app logo asset (logo job-2.jpg > logo-job.jpg)
